short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A mini Bitcoin tracker tucked into your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your own personal Bitcoin tracking app, enter your current bitcoin amount and watch it recalculate its worth in real-time. Set browser alerts when crypto hits a particular price. See how your crypto price has changed over time and make better decisions.

Saves data locally
